migrationFile.description: DevLab is an AI-powered coding practice, assessment, and competition microservice. It generates coding questions, evaluates code solutions, produces test cases, detects AI-generated code (fraud detection), creates AI-vs-learner competitions, and generates interactive HTML components with CodeMirror.

endpoints.description: Main data-request gateway. Coordinator sends all DevLab-bound requests through this entry point.

capabilities: provide AI-powered hints for coding questions
execute code in secure sandbox environment
generate HTML components for interactive coding questions
transform trainer exercises into validated question format

publishes.name: devlab.question.generated
publishes.description: Published when a new question is successfully generated and saved

publishes.name: devlab.competition.completed
publishes.description: Published when an AI-vs-learner competition is completed

subscribes.name: content.topic.created
subscribes.description: Subscribes to topic creation events to prepare question generation context

subscribes.name: course.completion
subscribes.description: Subscribes to course completion events from Course Builder
